name: events
description: We provide wide-ranging support for your personal development as well as for starting or growing your venture. Explore a few of the topics we can support you with below.

formats.name: Conference
formats.description: Bring people together to participate in a collective activity.

formats.name: Workshop
formats.description: a session where students listen to a lecturer, who talks through a particular topic. Lectures can be led in large groups, or small groups, and often take place in lecture theatres
